item.title: IsDelta Suppose to have this?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:11, topic:525076”][quote author=Null Amount link=topic=643768.msg4334469#msg4334469 date=1374124953]

Lol I know >.> that’s what I hate about Delta. Just change the packaging ^.^

so I should just create a firemaking.java?

You should repackage the entire thing so everything’s not dumped in Client.java.
[/quote]
So Organize stuff out of the client.java…more clean[/quote]
Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: IsDelta Suppose to have this?
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Lol I remember when I got my delta it had that, re-did the skill though. What you should do is get used too making new classes for skills and not putting everything in the client.java. Also try to package your server it really helps on organization.

Good luck

Read full topic

item.title: IsDelta Suppose to have this?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[s]If you look closer to the code you will see that id’s are switched.

example:

and the similar method will have it the opposite

This means,
when you click your logs first and then your tinderbox, it will light the logs.
When you first click your tinderbox and then your logs it will light them as well.
If you would remove one of these, you would be unable to light the logs in one of those 2 ^ ways.

Edit: I hadn’t scrolled through the code,
apparently you indeed have doubled code.
You should rewrite it completely actually, but it should be safe yo indeed remove the 2nd firemaking code if you’d want that.

Read full topic

item.title: IsDelta Suppose to have this?
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

Right now im nerfing xp rates and while i was doing firemaking i found two firemaking codes that look the same and have no idea ifi should just trash one of them

[code]//Firemaking
if ((itemUsed == 233) && (useWith == 237)) {
deleteItem(237, getItemSlot(237), 1);
addItem(235, 1);
} else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1511) || (itemUsed == 1511) && (useWith == 590)) {
if (playerLevel[11] >= 0) {
deleteItem(1511, 1);
makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);
addSkillXP(2400, 11);
sM(“You attempt to light the logs.”);
sM(“The fire catches and the logs begin to burn.”);
resetWC();
} else {
sM(“You need a firemaking of 0 to burn normal logs.”);
}
} else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1521) || (itemUsed == 1521) && (useWith == 590)) {
if (playerLevel[11] >= 15) {
deleteItem(1521, 1);
makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);
addSkillXP(3600, 11);
sM(“You attempt to light the logs.”);
sM(“The fire catches and the logs begin to burn.”);
resetWC();
} else {
sM(“You need a firemaking level of 15 to burn oak logs.”);
}
}

		else if ((itemUsed == 590) && (useWith == 1519) || (itemUsed == 1519) && (useWith == 590)) {
			if (playerLevel[11] >= 30) {

				makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);
				addSkillXP(18240, 11);

//Firemaking part2?
if ((itemUsed == 1511) && (useWith == 590)) {
if (playerLevel[11] >= 0) {
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10);
addSkillXP(2400, 11);

sM(“The fire catches and the logs begin to burn.”);

}
}

		else if ((itemUsed == 1519) && (useWith == 590)) {
